Name: Smackball
About the game: Smackball is a fast-paced, competitive sports game for two players, inspired by sports like tennis, squash and air-hockey. The rules are simple: smack the ball across half court before your timer runs out, and try to score a goal against your opponent! Features: Play locally, against your friends or the AI. Play online, in private matches against your friends, or match up against random players. 5 different game modes. 8 color palettes to personalize the look of the game. Customize the gameplay and create your own game modes. Note: Youâ€™ll need at least one controller for local multiplayer matches.
